title: Mount Hideaway Mysteries
overview: The Mount Hideaway Mysteries series revolves around a beautiful young government operative who returns to her rural Virginia hometown and, unofficially, uses her homeschooled childhood friends to solve murders that threaten the town and a nearby secret government facility, forcing her to confront her own past and potential enemies. The series blends elements of mystery, thriller, and faith-based drama, focusing on themes of family, faith, and transitioning from childhood to adulthood.
